articles.title: Who is Ksenia Karelina? American ballerina detained for 'high treason' in Russia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: American ballerina Ksenia Karelina was first arrested for minor offenses, but later she was charged with aiding the military effort in Ukraine amid the war.
articles.content: Ksenia Karelina, a dual Russian-American ballerina, has been placed under detention by Kremlin leader Vladimir Putin's Federal Security Service (FSB) on treasonous suspicion, according to reports rel… [+4057 chars]
